title: JSSC Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 51 Paramedical Staff Posts
description: The Jharkhand Staff Selection Commission (JSSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 51 Paramedical Staff Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th, 12th, ANM, D. Pharm, and DMLT can apply for the JSSC Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selectio...
